title: Royal children
brief_description: This interesting newsreel footage gives a picture of the lives of three of the British Royal Children: His Royal Highness, the Prince of Wales, Her Royal Highness Princess Anne and the Duke of York, Prince Andrew as a young child. Includes the christening photographs of Prince Charles and Princess Anne; their trips on the Royal yacht to Malta and Gibraltar; Prince Charles at school, family and national occasions.
